H0.text: Formula 1 - On which racetrack was the World Champion Ayrton Senna killed. Monza

H3.text: Formula 1 - On which racetrack was the World Champion Ayrton Senna killed. IMOLA

A4.text: The threeâ€‘time World Champion Ayrton Senna's Williams' steering column broke and he crashed into the concrete wall at the Tamburello corner on Lap 7. Senna died in the hospital several hours after his crash.
